"api theligu janathawa, samahara aya apita ahikuntika kiyanawa,nayi demala kiyanawa, nayi panikkaya kiyanawa.eka eka pathiwala aya eka eka widihata kiyanawa.api pottaniya kare gahagena yanawa, me rassawa karana apiwa me dawas wala gamata enawata minissu kamathi na, paramparawen huru wuna widihata atha balala sasthara kiyana apita manussayak sastharayak balanna atha dik karanna bayayi me dawas wala.samahara ayata hariyata kanna bonnawath na, apita dan jiwath wenna widihak nathiwa inne.apita wena jiwath wenna kramayakuth na, api gana balanna kiyanna" yayi kudagama gammanaye gamwasin pawasanawa.

* wishishtathama gayanaya (pirimi) – nawakamal pipena thuru githaya gayana kala dumal warnakulasuriya* wishishtathama gayanaya ( gahanu) – nawaka‘sitha igilenawa aatha ime’ gayana kala thilini saumya wijayarathna* wishishtathama gayanaya (pirimi) – prawina‘iki gasa handana’ githaya gayana kala amarasiri piris* wishishtathama gayanaya (gahanu) – prawina‘lihini’ githaya gayana kala indika upamali* wishishtathama gi thanu ha sangitha nirmanayadarshana ruwan disanayaka* wishishtathama geya pada rachanaya (wiwrutha)asanka ruwan (kusalatha sammana)janaka siriwardhana (kusalatha sammana)rawi siriwardhana (kusalatha sammana)* wishishtathama githa drushyakaranaya (adhyakshanaya)‘ eka hithin mawbimata wandinawa’ drushya githaya nirmanaya kala rukmal nirosh* wishishtathama sanyuktha thatiya ( nishpadanaya)‘irahanda pamanayi’ sanyuktha thatiya nishpadanaya kala admiral somathilaka disanayaka* wishishtathama lama gayanaya (balaka)‘swarnamali sa randune’ githaya gayana kala pawin manisha bandara gajanayaka* wishishtathama lama gayanaya balika‘pin sithuwili purawa’ githaya gayana kala sayuri nimthara rajapakshawishishtathama lama geya pada rachanaya (wiwrutha)tharanga samarawikrama (kusalatha sammana)de. wi. gallage (kusalatha sammana)rathmale bandula gunawardhana(kusalatha sammana)* wishishtathama lama gi thanu ha sangitha nirmanaya (wiwrutha)‘sepalika mal’ githaye ee.
